abstract: Anheuser-Busch‘s board is planning to reject InBev unsolicited $46.4 billion takeover bid this week, people close to the company said. The move, which has been widely expected, will formally start what is likely to become a bitter fight that may even spill over to a political debate about the maker of Budweiser.
lead_paragraph: Anheuser-Busch‘s board is planning to reject InBev unsolicited $46.4 billion takeover bid this week, people close to the company said. The move, which has been widely expected, will formally start what is likely to become a bitter fight that may even spill over to a political debate about the maker of Budweiser.
